snippet: In back-to-back arguments on Wednesday, the Supreme Court seemed open to limiting the use of drug-sniffing dogs outside homes but not near cars.
abstract: Supreme Court hears back-to-back arguments in two cases involving Fourth Amendment ban on unreasonable searches and use of drug-sniffing dogs.
lead_paragraph: In back-to-back arguments on Wednesday, the Supreme Court seemed open to limiting the use of drug-sniffing dogs outside homes but not near cars.

headline.seo: Justices Hear Arguments Involving Drug-Sniffing Dogs
headline.main: Drug-Sniffing Dogs Have Their Day in Court as Justices Hear 2 Arguments
headline.print_headline: Drug-Sniffing Dogs Have Their Day in Court as Justices Hear 2 Arguments
